abstract: The Windows Live Messenger will be available on the Xbox 360, bringing instant messaging from the computer to the television.
snippet: The Windows Live Messenger will be available on the Xbox 360, bringing instant messaging from the computer to the television.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft planned to announce today that it will make its Windows Live Messenger service available on its Xbox 360 game consoles, bringing instant messaging from the computer to the television.

headline.main: Microsoft Brings Instant Chat to TV Screen, Through Games
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Brings Instant Chat To TV Screen, Through Games
